sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card>
    <v-container>
      <v-row>
        <v-col>
          <v-toolbar dark>
            <v-toolbar-title>Nome</v-toolbar-title>
            <v-autocomplete
              v-model="select"
              :loading="loading"
              :items="items"
              :search-input.sync="search"
              cache-items
              class="mx-4"
              flat
              hide-no-data
              hide-details
              label="What state are you from?"
              solo-inverted
            ></v-autocomplete>
            <v-toolbar-title>{{en}}</v-toolbar-title>
            <v-autocomplete
              v-model="select2"
              :loading="loading2"
              :items="items2"
              :search-input.sync="search2"
              cache-items
              class="mx-4"
              flat
              hide-no-data
              hide-details
              label="What state are you from?"
              solo-inverted
            ></v-autocomplete>
            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
            <v-card-actions>
              <v-spacer></v-spacer>
              <v-btn class="m">
                <v-icon class="mr-3">mdi-feature-search-outline</v-icon>Search
              </v-btn>
            </v-card-actions>
          </v-toolbar>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios";
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      loading: false,
      items: [],
      search: null,
      select: null,
      states: [],
      loading2: false,
      items2: [],
      search2: null,
      select2: null,
      states2: [],
      search3: null,
      n: 0
    };
  },
  watch: {
    search(val) {
      console.log(this.$store.state.namesAdded)
      val && val !== this.select && this.querySelections(val);
    },
    search2(val) {
      val && val !== this.select2 && this.querySelections2(val);
    }
  },

  created() {
    this.n = this.en
    console.log(this.$store.getters.names)
    this.getEmpNames();
    this.getFreg();
  },

  updated(){

  },

  computed: {
    en() {
      return this.$store.state.namesAdded;
    }
  },

  methods: {
    querySelections(v) {
      this.loading = true;
      //this.$store.commit('add')
      if (this.$store.state.namesAdded == true) {
        this.getEmpNames();
        console.log("in if")
        
      }
      // Simulated ajax query
      setTimeout(() => {
        this.items = this.states.filter(e => {
          return (e || "").toLowerCase().indexOf((v || "").toLowerCase()) > -1;
        });
        this.loading = false;
      }, 500);
    },
    querySelections2(v) {
      this.loading2 = true;
      // Simulated ajax query
      setTimeout(() => {
        this.items2 = this.states2.filter(e => {
          return (e || "").toLowerCase().indexOf((v || "").toLowerCase()) > -1;
        });
        this.loading2 = false;
      }, 500);
    },
    async getEmpNames() {
      try {
        const response = await axios.get("http://localhost:4000/empresas/name");
        //this.$store.state.autoCompEmpNames = response.data;
        this.states = response.data;
      } catch (error) {
        console.error(error);
      }
    },
    async getFreg() {
      try {
        const response = await axios.get("http://localhost:4000/empresas/freg");
        this.states2 = response.data;
      } catch (error) {
        console.error(error);
      }
    }
  }
};
</script>
